title: Spaceman Prism 20K 5pk
description: Detailed Feature Explanation: Number of Puffs: Enjoy up to 20,000 puffs, making this one of the longest-lasting disposables on the market. E-liquid Capacity: With 18ml of Smok's finest flavors, you get a rich and satisfying vaping experience without frequent refills. Nicotine Strength: Tailored to your preferences, the Spaceman Prism 20K offers various nicotine strengths to choose from. Battery Capacity: The powerful 1000mAh rechargeable battery ensures your device is ready whenever you are. Easily recharge using the USB Type-C charging port. Integrated Mesh Coil Design: Delivers smooth and consistent hits with enhanced flavor production. Smart Display Screen: Keeps you updated on your battery life and e-liquid levels, so you're always in control. Adjustable Airflow Control: Customize your vaping experience with adjustable airflow settings. Output Modes: Three modes (Boost, Norm, Soft) let you tailor the deviceÂ’s performance to your liking. Embark on your vaping adventure with the Spaceman Prism 20K by Smok, where innovation meets convenience for an out-of-this-world experience.
